entry.title: How to Get Microsoft 365 for FREE

media:group.media:title: How to Get Microsoft 365 for FREE
media:group.media:description: In this step-by-step tutorial, learn how to get Microsoft 365 on your laptop or desktop PC for free. We look at how to use Microsoft365.com and the Microsoft 365 app that comes pre-installed with Windows to access all the features of Microsoft 365 without paying a dime. You will be able to use Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote on the web, and more for free on your PC, tablet, or phone. You will also learn how to get the Microsoft 365 desktop apps for free if you are an eligible student or teacher. To use Microsoft 365 on the web, you need an internet connection.
